name: PRETTY FLAWLESS 5- PIECE BRUSH SET - Pearl White
description:
*PRE SALE ORDERS* SPECIAL INTRODUCTORY PRICING AND OFFERING*  SHIPPING IS THE WEEK OF NOV 12**


PRETTYGIRLS is proud to launch our first product: the  Pretty Flawless 5 Piece set - PEARL WHITE for the prissy girls!

-Uniquely 100% Anti-Aging and do not tug or pull on the skin due to them being designed to be super soft on the skin for comfort, feel and the anti-aging factor! 

-100% vegan and animal- cruelty free! 

-Gorgeous brushes that are sturdy, easy to use and provide a flawless airbrushed finish each time!! 

-Designed to be used with both powder AND Liquids!! 

Our brushes stand strong and side by side with big name competitor brushes (MAC, SEDONA LACE, SIGMA) and are high quality without the high price tag! 

These precision brushes work fantastically as a compliment to any makeup products that you choose to use them to apply! High pigment powders, liquid foundations, mineral powders, blush (cream or powder), etc!
